Name: Home Design | Floor Plan
About the game: Home Design - Floor Plan offers you the opportunity to quickly and easily create 3D floor plans and furnish your rooms according to your taste. Create high-resolution images of your project with Home Design - Floor Plan. Convince your customers and business partners with realistic 3D images. Use first person mode to walk through your project virtually. Plan your building project or set up your own home. Home Design - Floor Plan helps you and your architect to successfully realize your project. Particularities: - Extensive furniture libraries for interior design - 3D viewer, fly cam mode and first person mode - Photo function to create high-resolution images - Filter functions - Light and shadow effects - Measurement function Don't wait any longer and install Home Design - Floor Plan now!
